ul.li: Description des principaux ouvrages de peinture et sculpture [microform] : actuellement existans dans les églises, couvens, & lieux publics de la ville d'Anvers : donné au jour pour l'utilité des voyageurs.

A new pocket companion for Oxford, or, Guide through the University [microform] : containing an accurate description of the public edifices, the buildings in each of the colleges, the gardens, statues, pictures, hieroglyphics and all other curiosities in the University : with an historical account of the foundation of the several colleges, and their present state : to which is added, descriptions of the buildings, tapestry, paintings, sculptures, temples, gardens, &c. at Blenheim, Ditchley, Heythrop, Nuneham, and Stow, the seats of His Grace the Duke of Marlborough, the Right Honourable the Earls of Litchfield, Shrewsbury, Harcourt and Temple.
Observations sur la destruction de la promenade du jardin du Palais-Royal [microform] : lettre d'un anglois établi à Paris, à Milord P*** à Londres.
